title: Dr. Maya Angelou, Part 2: Best Advice She Ever Received
description: Oprah’s heart-to-heart conversation with the late Dr. Maya Angelou continues. Dr. Angelou shares some of her greatest life lessons on aging brilliantly and living with gratitude. She is moved to tears as she recalls the revelation that changed her life forever, and reveals the best piece of advice she ever received.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
